pageContent: Context: The incidence of localised prostate cancer is increasing worldwide. In light of recent evidence, current, radical, whole-gland treatments for organ-confined disease have being questioned with respect to their side effects, cancer control, and cost. Focal therapy may be an effective alternative strategy.

metaData.source:
Quality of life following high-intensity focused ultrasound for the treatment of localized prostate cancer: a prospective study
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/20529139/
